rustguard-pro.name: RustGuard Pro
rustguard-pro.description: Underbody protection to prevent corrosion and structural damage.
useCases: Protects against road salt in winter.
Prevents rust from forming on the chassis.

toughguard-premium.name: ToughGuard Premium
toughguard-premium.description: A premium paint sealant that protects against environmental damage.
points: Covers damage from road tar, well water, bird droppings, tree sap, acid rain, etc.
useCases: Keeps your car looking glossy and new.
Makes washing easier as dirt and grime slide off.

interior-protection.name: Interior Leather & Fabric Protection
interior-protection.description: A complete interior treatment to protect against stains and damage.
points: Protects against stains such as: coffee, juices, crayons, chocolate, gum
Prevents cracking, covers rips, tears & burns
useCases: Ideal for families with children or pets.
Maintains the value and appearance of your interior.

elite-ceramic-coating.name: Elite Ceramic Coating
elite-ceramic-coating.description: Advanced ceramic protection with superior durability and shine.
useCases: Provides showroom-quality shine for years.
Reduces need for frequent washing and waxing.

elite-paint-correction.name: Elite Paint Correction
useCases: Eliminates imperfections from daily driving.
Prepares surface for maximum coating adhesion.

elite-interior-detail.name: Elite Interior Detailing
elite-interior-detail.description: Comprehensive interior cleaning and protection treatment.
useCases: Restores interior to like-new condition.
Extends life of leather and fabric surfaces.

platinum-ppf-full.name: Platinum Full PPF Coverage
platinum-ppf-full.description: Complete paint protection film coverage for maximum protection.
useCases: Ultimate protection against rock chips and debris.
Maintains resale value with pristine paint condition.

platinum-graphene-coating.name: Platinum Graphene Coating
useCases: Top-tier protection for luxury vehicles.
Lasts longer than traditional ceramic coatings.

platinum-wheel-coating.name: Platinum Wheel & Caliper Coating
platinum-wheel-coating.description: Protective coating for wheels and brake calipers.
useCases: Keeps wheels looking clean longer.
Protects against corrosion and oxidation.

diamond-shield.name: Diamond Shield Windshield Protection
diamond-shield.description: A treatment that improves visibility and protects your windshield.
points: Help against chipping, cracking, clouding, sand, salt
useCases: Safer driving in bad weather conditions.
Prevents minor chips from turning into large cracks.

suntek-complete.name: Suntek Pro Complete Package
suntek-complete.description: Protects the most vulnerable parts of your vehicle from rock chips and scratches.

suntek-standard.name: Suntek Pro Standard Package
suntek-standard.description: Essential protection for the front-facing areas of your car.

headlights.name: Headlights Protection
headlights.description: A durable film to prevent hazing, yellowing, and cracking of headlight lenses.
points: Maintains clarity for optimal night visibility.

doorcups.name: Door Cups Only
doorcups.description: Invisible film applied behind door handles to prevent scratches from keys and fingernails.
points: Protects a high-wear area from daily use.

evernew.name: EverNew Appearance Protection
evernew.description: Mobile cosmetic repair service for minor damages.

screen-defender.name: Screen Defender
screen-defender.description: Premium protection film for your vehicle's touchscreen display.
